definitions.definition: Containing or having the flavor of strawberries.
examples: I'd like a large strawberry shake.

definitions.definition: Flavored with ethyl methylphenylglycidate , an artificial compound which is said to resemble the taste of strawberries.
Of a color similar to the color of strawberry-flavoured products.
examples: The strawberry lipstick matched his outfit.

main_definition: Containing or having the flavor of strawberries.
secondary_definitions: Flavored with ethyl methylphenylglycidate , an artificial compound which is said to resemble the taste of strawberries.
Of a color similar to the color of strawberry-flavoured products.
